PropertyValue.String: Purchase Contract
Gets the header details of all the purchase contracts in the system

Gets the header details of all the purchase contracts in the system. This operation filters and sorts the returned data. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the header details of a purchase contract
Gets the header details such as supplier, company code, currency, and so on of a purchase contract, using the purchase contract number provided.
Gets the details of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system
Gets the details of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the item details of an item in a purchase contract
Gets the item details such as material, plant, quantity, and so on of an item in a purchase contract, using the purchase contract and item number provided.
Gets the details of all the partners of all the purchase contracts in the system
Gets the details of all the partners of all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the partner details of a purchase contract

Gets the partner details such as partner function, purchasing organization, and so on in a purchase contract, using the purchase contract number, item number, purchasing organization, plant, partner function, partner counter, and supplier sub range provided.
Gets the details of the validities of the header in the system
Gets the details of the validities of the header in all the purchase contracts in the system.Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the detail of a specific validity maintained for the header
Gets the detail of a specific validity maintained for the header in a purchase contract, using the number of thepurchase contract , condition record number and validity end date provided.
Gets the details of the condition amounts of all the validities of the header in the system

Gets the details of the condition amounts of all the validities of the header in all the purchase contracts in the system.Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the detail of a specific condition amount maintained for a specific validity, maintained for the header

Gets the detail of a specific condition amount maintained for a specific validity, maintained for the header in a purchase contractusing the number of thepurchase contract, condition record number, condition sequential number and validity end date provided.
Gets the details of the condition scales of all the condition amounts of all the validities of the header in the system

Gets the details of the condition scales of all the condition amounts of all the validities of the header in all the purchase contracts in the system.Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the detail of a specific condition scale amount maintained for a specific amount, maintained for the header

Gets the detail of a specific condition scale amount maintained for a specific amount, maintained for the header in a purchase contract using the number ofpurchase contract , condition record number, condition sequential number, scale line and validity end date provided.
Gets the details of the validities of all the items in the system
Gets the details of the validities of all the items in all the purchase contracts in the system.Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the detail of a specific validity maintained for a specific item

Gets the detail of a specific validity maintained for a specific item in a purchase contract, using the number of thepurchase contract , item number, condition record number and validity end date provided.
Gets the details of the condition amounts of all the validities of all the items in the system

Gets the details of the condition amounts of all the validities of all the items in all the purchase contracts in the system.Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the detail of a specific condition amount maintained for a specific validity, maintained for a specific item

Gets the detail of a specific condition amount maintained for a specific validity, maintained for a specific item in a purchase contractusing the number of thepurchase contract, item number, condition record number, condition sequential number and validity end date provided.
Gets the details of the condition scales of all the condition amounts of all the validities of all the items in the system

Gets the details of the condition scales of all the condition amounts of all the validities of all the items in all the purchase contracts in the system.Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the detail of a specific condition amount maintained for a specific validity, maintained for a specific item

Gets the detail of a specific condition amount maintained for a specific validity, maintained for a specific item in a purchase contract using the number ofpurchase contract , item number, condition record number, condition sequential number, scale line and validity end date provided.
Gets the details of all the accounting assignments of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system

Gets the details of all the accounting assignments of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase contract

Gets the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase contract, such as GL acocunt, cost center, and so on, using the purchase contract number, item number, and serial number of the accounting line provided.
Gets the details of all the delivery addresses of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system

Gets the details of all the delivery addresses of all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the details of all the delivery addresses of a specific item in a purchase contract
Gets the delivery address details of a specific item in a purchase contract, such as name, city name, postal code, and so on, using the purchase contract number, item number, and address ID provided.
Gets the details of all the value-added service data for purchase contract items in the system

Gets the details of all the value-added service data for purchase contract items in the system. You can use this operation by activating ISR_RETAILSYSTEM business function. Note that if there are many purchase contract items in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the details of all the value-added service data for a specific purchase contract item

Gets the details of all the value-added service data for a specific item in a purchase contract, such as Service Types, Sub Service types, and so on, using the purchase contract number, item number, item group, service type and sub service type.You can use this operation by activating ISR_RETAILSYSTEM business function.
Gets all the header notes in the system
Gets all the header notes in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the header notes of a specific purchase contract

Gets the header notes of a specific purchase contract. This operation uses the number of the purchase contract or object ID of the purchasing document note, text ID that identifies the type of note, and language key provided.
Gets all the item notes in the system
Gets all the item notes in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets the item notes of a specific purchase contract

Gets the item notes of a specific purchase contract. This operation uses the number of the purchase contract or object ID of the purchasing document note, text ID that identifies the type of note, and language key provided.
Gets the condition validity details of a specific condition type

Gets the details of the condition validity details of a specific header condition type.This operation uses the number of the purchase contract ,condition record,condition validity end date and condition sequential number provided.
Gets the purchase contract details of a specific condition type

Gets the details of the purchase contract of a specific header condition This operation uses the number of the purchase contract , condition record,condition validity end date and condition sequential number provided.
Gets the details of the condition scales of a specific condition amount of a specific validity of a specific header

Gets the details of the condition scales of a specific condition amount of a specific validity of a specific header of a specific purchase contract. This operation usesthe number of the purchase contract,condition record number, and condition sequential number provided.
Gets the purchase contract details of a specific condition scale

Gets the details of the purchase contract of a specific contract condition This operation uses the number of the purchase contract ,condition record,condition validity end date and condition sequential number provided.
Gets the details of the condition amount of a specific condition scale of a specific validity of a specific header

Gets the details of the condition amount of a specific condition scale of a specific validity of a specific header of specificpurchase contract . This operation usesthe number of the purchase contract , condition record number, and condition sequential number provided.
Gets the purchase contract details of a specific condition validity
Gets the details of the purchase contract of a specific header condition validity.This operation uses the number of the purchase contract ,condition record and condition validity end date provided.
Gets the details of the condition amounts of a specific validity of a specific header

Gets the details of the condition amounts of a specific validity of a specific header of a specific purchase contract. This operation uses the number of the purchase contract and condition record number provided.
Gets the details of the condition scales of a specific condition amount of a specific validity of a specific item

Gets the details of the condition scales of a specific condition amount of a specific validity of a specific item of a specific purchase contract. This operation usesthe number of the purchase contract, item number, condition record number, and condition sequential number provided.
Gets the purchase contract details of a specific condition type

Gets the details of the purchase contract of a specific item condition This operation uses the number of the purchase contract ,item number,condition record,condition validity end date and condition sequential number provided.
Gets the condition validity details of a specific condition type

Gets the details of the condition validity details of a specific item condition type.This operation uses the number of the purchase contract ,item number,condition record,condition validity end date and condition sequential number provided.
Gets the details of the condition amount of a specific condition scale of a specific validity of a specific item

Gets the details of the condition amount of a specific condition scale of a specific validity of a specific item of specificpurchase contract . This operation usesthe number of the purchase contract ,item number, condition record number, and condition sequential number provided.
Gets the purchase contract details of a specific condition scale

Gets the details of the purchase contract of a specific contract item condition This operation uses the number of the purchase contract ,item number,condition record,condition validity end date and condition sequential number provided.
Gets the details of the condition amounts of a specific validity of a specific item

Gets the details of the condition amounts of a specific validity of a specific item of a specific purchase contract. This operation uses the number of the purchase contract, item number, and condition record number provided.
Gets the purchase contract details of a specific condition validity

Gets the details of the purchase contract of a specific item condition validity.This operation uses the number of the purchase contract ,item number,condition record and condition validity end date provided.
Gets the purchase contract item details of a specific condition validity

Gets the details of the purchase contract item item details of a specific item condition validity.This operation uses the number of the purchase contract,item number,condition record and condition validity end date provided.
Gets the partner details of a purchase contract
Gets all the partner details of a purchase contract, using the purchase contract number provided.
Gets the item details of all the items in a purchase contract
Gets the item details such as material, plant, quantity, and so on of all the items in a purchase contract, using the purchase contract number provided.
Reads all value-added service data for a specific purchase contract item

Reads all value-added service data for a specific purchase contract item using purchase contract number and item number. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.
Reads all value-added service data for a specific purchase contract item

Reads all value-added service data for a specific purchase contract item using purchase contract number and item number. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.
Gets the details of a purchase contract to which a specific item belongs
Gets the details of a purchase contract to which a specific item belongs, using the purchase contract number and item number provided.
Gets the delivery address details of an item in a purchase contract
Gets the delivery address details of an item in a purchase contract, using the purchase contract number, item number, and address ID provided.
Gets the account assignment details of all the accounting lines of an item in a purchase contract
Gets the account assignment details of all the accounting lines of an item in a purchase contract, using the purchase contract number, item number, and serial number of the accounting line provided.
Gets the conditions details of an item in a purchase contract

Gets the conditions details of an item in a purchase contract, using purchase contract number, item number, condition type, condition validity date, condition record number, and condition sequential number of a condition provided.
Gets all the item notes in the system
Gets all the item notes in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Gets all the header notes in the system
Gets all the header notes in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.
Creates a new purchase contract
Creates a new purchase contract with one or more items. It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Updates the header details of a purchase contract

Updates details of the header of a purchase contract using the purchase contract number provided. It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Creates an item in all the purchase contracts in the system

Creates an item in all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Updates an item in a purchase contract

Updates details of an item in a purchase contract using the purchase contract and item number provided. It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Adds a business partner to all the purchase contracts in the system

Adds a business partner to all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Updates the partner details of a purchase contract

Updates the partner details such as partner function, purchasing organization, and so on in a purchase contract. This is done using the purchase contract number, item number, purchasing organization, plant, partner function, partner counter, and supplier sub range provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Creates an account assignment for all the items in all the purchase contracts in the system

Creates an account assignment to all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Updates the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase contract

Updates the account assignment details of a specific accounting line of an item in a purchase contract. This is done using the purchase contract number, item number, and serial number of the accounting line provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Adds a delivery address to all the items, in all the purchase contracts in the system

Adds a delivery address to all the purchase contracts in the system. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Updates the details of all the delivery addresses of a specific item in a purchase contract

Updates the details of all the delivery addresses of a specific item in a purchase contract. This is done using the purchase contract number, item number, and address ID provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Creates a new header note for a purchase contract

Creates a new header note for a purchase contract. This operation uses the number of the purchase contract, text ID that identifies the type of note, and language key provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Updates the header notes of a specific purchase contract

Updates the header notes of a specific purchase contract. This operation uses the number of the purchase contract, text ID that identifies the type of note, and language key provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Creates a new item note for a purchase contract

Creates a new item note for a purchase contract. This operation uses the number of the purchase contract, item number, text ID that identifies the type of note, and language key provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Updates the item notes of a purchase contract

Updates the item notes of a purchase contract. This operation uses the number of the purchase contract, item number, text ID that identifies the type of note, and language key provided.It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, errors are returned in the response.
Creates one or more value-added services for a specific purchase contract item
Creates value-added service data for a specific purchase contract item that you must specify in the payload.You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.
Updates a specific value-added service

Updates the data of a specific value-added service item using purchase contract number, item number, value-added service type, and value-added subservice type. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.
Deletes a specific value-added service

Deletes the data of a specific value-added service item using purchase contract number, item number, value-added service type, and value-added subservice type. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.
